Descriptions: Every volunteer* should have a DBS check
Every volunteer should have completed the Appointment Process within 5  months
Every volunteer should have completed Getting Started training for their roles within 5 months
Every volunteer has completed their GDPR learning with 5 months.
Every volunteer has refreshed their Safety knowledge within the last 5 years
Every volunteer has refreshed their Safeguarding knowledge within the last 5 years
Every volunteer in a role with a wood badge has a First Aid qualification.
Every volunteer should have completed the Wood Badge for their roles within 3 years
